wikipedia_page.main: Cecil Frederick Douglas Buttle, known as "Cec", born at Norton Fitzwarren, Taunton, Somerset on 11 January 1906 and died at Taunton on 15 December 1988, was associated with Somerset County Cricket Club for more than 50 years as a player, a net bowler, a substitute fielder, a reserve umpire and, for about 30 years after the Second World War, the groundsman at the County Ground, Taunton.

link_mentions.page: List of Somerset County Cricket Club players
